entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] New interop `DisabledRuntimeMarshalling*` tests failing #64127
  • Assertion failed 'helper.CanEncodeAllOffsets(REGSIZE_BYTES)' during 'Generate code' #64125
  • UnhandledExceptionEventHandler in MemoryCache can cause a deadlock. #64115
  • Linux Arm64 TimeZoneInfo Duplicate DisplayNames #64111
  • .NET 6 crashes on a macOS 12.x virtual machine on Apple Silicon (arm64) #64103
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData in .NET 6 #64101
  • Single-file and self-deployed application encounters "random" System.IO.FileNotFoundException exceptions when loading libraries #64120
  • Special-case alternation with anchors in Regex analysis and code gen #64097
    7.0.0
  • Generation of dynamic types with multiple threads using System.Reflection.Emit components causes runtime corruption #64094
  • System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath throws OutOfMemoryException when calling Widen(pen). #64092
  • Type.GetMethod ignores BindingFlag.DeclaredOnly for records #64124
  • libnethost is only provided with release CRT #64087
  • fatal error LNK1295: '/INCREMENTAL' not compatible with '/DEBUGTYPE' specification... #64082
    7.0.0
  • .net6, GetManifestResourceNames return empty #64090
  • TokenBucketRateLimiter.WaitAsync() does not immediately reduce the _queueCount on cancellation #64078

Closed

  • Ordering issues with `DYN_BLK` nodes #62014
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: default state for all objects #64007
  • JsonObject does not respect JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull #54184
    7.0.0
  • SSL_CERT_DIR/SSL_CERT_FILE with move over to Apple's libraries #60030
    Future
  • Cannot sign certificates with elliptic curve secp256k1 #61767
  • system.reflection.metadata.applyupdatetest.testaddstaticfield failing on OSX with checked coreclr #64117
  • system.reflection.metadata.applyupdatetest.testaddstaticfield failing on OSX with checked coreclr #64118
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration tests failing on netfx x86 #64071
  • Clean up some RegexNode code #62651
    7.0.0
  • Setting LC_ALL=zh_CN.utf8 LANG=zh_CN.utf8 without using Globalization Invariant Mode in Linux has serious performance problems #64093
  • PathAssemblyResolver System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext should be sealed or allow overrides #36753
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify complains about unbox; ldfld #63953
    Future
  • DiscardBufferedData does not skip BOM when the position is reset to the beginning #63789
    7.0.0
  • Cannot build mono wasm sample, error NETSDK1112: The runtime pack for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm was not downloaded. #64089
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.Directory_CreateDirectory.DirectoryLongerThanMaxLongPathWithExtendedSyntax_ThrowsException #64080
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeCompatibilityAttribute.DisableRuntimeMarshalling #60639
    7.0.0
  • MemoryMappedFile always flushing on dispose - even if nothing was written? #62768
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength(SafeFileHandle handle) method #58376
    7.0.0
  • JIT doesn't recognize memory read in Vector256.Create #53541
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation Fault #62387
  • Browser wasm on windows CI builds broken #63987

PullRequests

Created

  • Add additional loop table asserts #64126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Android Maui Startup testing #64121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Spmi replay asmdiffs mac os arm64 #64119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Re-enable failing long path test #64113
    area-System.IO
  • Refactor `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pipelines: Add wasm jobs #64109
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon (.NET 6) #64104
    community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [CodeSpace] Install v8 and Prebuild wasm #64100
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requirements #64099
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix one source of perf regression in GCHeap::Alloc. #64091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix minor things in comments to DllImportGenerator #64088
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fixes a few issues for dprintf on OSX #64076
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Extract SuperPMI into a separate component #64035
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ignore conversion exceptions during dictionary construction #63792
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_DYN_BLK` #63026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup trailing whitespace. #64112
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.UserSecrets` #63700
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection` #63836
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Address-expose locals under complex local addresses in block morphing #63100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle embedded assignments in copy propagation #63447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update branding for 7.0 Preview1 #64123
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove enable drawing on unix switch #64084
    area-System.Drawing, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Make ApiCompat.proj incrementally buildable #64037
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update format script permissions so it can be called on Unix systems directly. #64107
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803)" #64108
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Do not set `GTF_NO_CSE` for sources of block copies #63462
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • RegexNode cleanup #64074
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Ensure several helper intrinsics are correctly imported and handled #63972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed IsFloatPositiveZero from returning 'true' on non-constant double operands #64083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add StringSyntaxAttribute.Json #64081
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Apply changes on wasm using sdb protocol. #63705
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid additional local created for delegate invocations #63796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILVerify: Handle readonly references in ldfld #64077
    area-ILVerification
  • Update the macOS CoreCLR building documentation #63932
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64085
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Initial WASI support prototype #63890
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make ILLink validation steps in libs incrementally buildable #64041
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    blocking, area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • don't Flush readonly MemoryMappedViewAccessor on disposal #63794
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength #63992
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable some browser legs on the extra-platforms pipeline #64065
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add pmi_path argument to superpmi.py script and use it in the superpmi-collect pipeline. #63983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove commented code #63869
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Log message of unexpected exception in ThrowsAny #64064
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Android remove backward timezones #64028
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump Intellisensense package version to latest from `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement hash and HMAC stream one shots #63757
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix JsonObject constuctor #64055
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, no recent activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEquatable<T> on value types overriding Equals (and enable CA1066/CA1067) #63690
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Trying to fix issue #63788: "NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event leaks threads on Linux #63963
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Enable Internal.Console.Write in System.Private.CoreLib #63949
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Restrict parallelism in LLVM FullAOT compile, to prevent OOM #63800
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support chrome debugging using chrome://inspect #63900
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ignoring leading dot when comparing cookie domains #64038
    area-System.Net
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • #51371 fixed failing test in iossimulator #63877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing handle function enter/return macros #64061
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove spaces from GH labels used by FabricBot #64048
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Throw during renegotiation if there is incomplete received TLS frame #64066
    area-System.Net.Security
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • force extra warmup #64075
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure
